name: BulgarianLibrary
0:
”Alexa, ask bulgarian library to play story stone in the swamp”
”Alexa, ask bulgarian library to play album christmas songs”
”Alexa, ask bulgarian library to play radio horizon”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bulgarian library
des:
You cherish bulgarian language and culture. You are at the right place - use Alexa to play bulgarian stories, songs and radio-stations for people of all ages.

Enjoy continuous "playback across all your devices" (start playing a story on your home-alexa, stop it half the way through, get in the car and resume it on your cellphone-alexa or any other device on your account)

Listen to radio stations (like Horizont, Hr.Botev, BgRadio and more). 
More stories will be made available over time for the whole family to enjoy.

This is a FREE actively developed skill - bugs might sneak in undetected. Pls be patient and report to the developer (zoro@bgbiblioteka.club) any problems, suggestions, etc. Be part of this initiative - help this platform grow and flourish.

For full description go to https://bgbiblioteka.club/alexa/setup
